text.en: Pervasive lord and primordial protector, Samantabhadra,

text.en-trans: dechen longchö dzok ku nang tayé

text.en: Compassionate tamer of beings, glorious Padmākara,
And the sky-like yogin, Dudjom Drakpa Tsal—
To all of you I pray: Inspire my mind-stream with your blessings,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: So that I may conquer saṃsāra, benefit all with whom I am connected,
text.en-trans: si lé namgyal dreltsé dönden zhing

text.en: And gain the glorious power to stir saṃsāra from its very depths!
text.en-trans: khorwa dongtruk nüpé pal tob shok
